name: realML.localgraphclustering.multiclass_label_prediction
description: This function predicts labels for unlabelled nodes. For details refer to: D. Gleich and M. Mahoney. Variational Using Local Spectral Methods to Robustify Graph-Based Learning Algorithms. SIGKDD 2015. https://www.stat.berkeley.edu/~mmahoney/pubs/robustifying-kdd15.pdf

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Each list of this list corresponds to indices of nodes that are assumed to belong in a certain class. For example, list[i] is a list of indices of nodes that are assumed to belong in class i.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Teleportation parameter of the personalized PageRank linear system. The smaller the more global the personalized PageRank vector is.

parameters.name: rho
parameters.description: Regularization parameter for the l1-norm of the model.

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.description: Tolerance for FISTA for solving the l1-regularized personalized PageRank problem.

parameters.name: max_iter
parameters.description: Maximum number of iterations of FISTA, ISTA or ACL.

parameters.name: cpp
parameters.description: Use the faster C++ version of FISTA or not.
